commands.name: az functionapp config ssl bind
commands.summary: Bind an SSL certificate to a function app.
commands.syntax:
az functionapp config ssl bind --certificate-thumbprint
                               --ssl-type {IP, SNI}
                               [--hostname]
                               [--ids]
                               [--name]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--slot]
                               [--subscription]
examples: az functionapp config ssl bind --certificate-thumbprint {certificate-thumbprint} --name MyFunctionApp --resource-group MyResourceGroup --ssl-type SNI

commands.name: az functionapp config ssl create
commands.summary: Create a Managed Certificate for a hostname in a function app.
examples: az functionapp config ssl create --resource-group MyResourceGroup --name MyWebapp --hostname cname.mycustomdomain.com

commands.name: az functionapp config ssl delete
commands.summary: Delete an SSL certificate from a function app.

commands.name: az functionapp config ssl import
commands.summary: Import an SSL certificate to a function app from Key Vault.
examples: az functionapp config ssl import --resource-group MyResourceGroup --name MyFunctionApp --key-vault MyKeyVault --key-vault-certificate-name MyCertificateName

az functionapp config ssl import --resource-group MyResourceGroup --name MyFunctionApp --key-vault '/subscriptions/[sub id]/resourceGroups/[rg]/providers/Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/[vault name]' --key-vault-certificate-name MyCertificateName

commands.name: az functionapp config ssl list
commands.summary: List SSL certificates for a function app.
examples: az functionapp config ssl list --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az functionapp config ssl show
commands.summary: Show the details of an SSL certificate for a function app.
examples: az functionapp config ssl show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --certificate-name cname.mycustomdomain.com

commands.name: az functionapp config ssl unbind
commands.summary: Unbind an SSL certificate from a function app.

commands.name: az functionapp config ssl upload
commands.summary: Upload an SSL certificate to a function app.
examples: az functionapp config ssl upload --certificate-file {certificate-file} --certificate-password {certificate-password} --name MyFunctionApp     --resource-group MyResourceGroup
